DOC.brief_summary: Overall study design : This study prospective , non-randomized , multicenter postmarket clinical follow-up study two study arm use two shoulder prosthesis PROMOS™ STANDARD ( group A ) PROMOS REVERSE™ ( group B ) . The study collect efficacy safety data 10 year .
DOC.brief_title: Patient Benefit From New Modular Shoulder Prosthesis PROMOS
DOC.detailed_description: Primary objective study : The primary objective quantify patient benefit primary total shoulder arthroplasty modular PROMOS™ shoulder system multicenter cohort study ( real world approach ) . Patient benefit quantify use objective validated subjective measure function , activity daily live ( ADL ) quality life ( QoL ) . Secondary objective : - Rate implant relate finding like radiological loosening glenoid complication like intraoperative stem fissure - Prosthesis survival common time point , e.g . 5 10 year
